title: Mobile-Based Social Domain Language Learning Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Field-Oriented Language Learning Environment Utilizing Smartphones and SNS, Focusing on Improving Language Use in Social Contexts Based on Practical Experience

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately use 50 beginner-level language expressions required for everyday social situations by utilizing mobile devices and SNS.
Learners will improve and document their language learning process at least twice through peer feedback and teacher-designed research-based methods.
Learners will develop three or more language application scenarios applicable to real-world work environments through project deliverables completed over four weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
